div.head: Taxonomies
div.p: In the Authority-Files repo there are currently a series of files generated from lists which have nothing but a title and an id.
Each of these refers to one value so that they can be enriched with a description which is out of the schema and they can be used for relations and ref as the other Ids.
When reordering the hierarchy of the list, please remember to use the same name you give in the taxonomy.xml file also for the filename and the id.
An example of description inside an authority files
div.ab: A miniature showing Jesus being arrested by the guards of the Temple, (Mt 26:50; Mk 14:43; Lk 22:52; Jn 18:3), the scene may feature additional details such as The Kiss of Judas, or Peter cutting off the ear of Malchus (Mt 26:51; Mk 14:47; Lk 22:50 Jn 18:10).
